original_text: Miriam and Aaron began to talk against Moses because of his Cushite wife, for he had married a Cushite.
korean_text: 모세가 구스 여자를 취하였더니 그 구스 여자를 취하였으므로 미리암과 아론이 모세를 비방하니라

sentences.original_text: Miriam and Aaron began to talk against Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 미리암과 아론이 모세를 반대하여 말하기 시작했으니

sentences.original_text: for he had married a Cushite
